title: Under night streets
creator_credit: British Transport Films, Edgar H. Anstey and Ralph Keene
brief_description: A commentary on the people who work all night to keep London’s Underground on the move. Told with Cockney humour, it is the story of the care and thoroughness of night maintenance work.
creator_credit_for_label: British Transport Films, Edgar H. Anstey and Ralph Keene
